Name: Base Message Registry
Description: This registry defines the base messages for Redfish

GeneralError.Description: Indicates that a general error has occurred.
GeneralError.Message: A general error has occurred. See ExtendedInfo for more information.

PropertyValueTypeError.Description: Indicates that a property was given the wrong value type.
PropertyValueTypeError.Message: The value id for the property member_id is of a different type than the property can accept.
PropertyValueTypeError.Resolution: Correct the value for the property in the request params and resubmit the request if the operation failed.

PropertyValueUnknownError.Description: Indicates that the value of the attribute does not exist.
PropertyValueUnknownError.Message: The value id for the property id does not exist.
PropertyValueUnknownError.Resolution: Correct the value for the property in the request params and resubmit the request if the operation failed.

MalformedJSON.Description: Indicates that the request body was malformed JSON.  Could be duplicate, syntax error,etc.
MalformedJSON.Message: The request body submitted was malformed JSON and could not be parsed by the receiving service.
MalformedJSON.Resolution: Ensure that the request body is valid JSON and resubmit the request.

PropertyUnknown.Description: Indicates that an unknown property was included in the request body.
PropertyUnknown.Message: The property oData is not in the list of valid properties for the resource.
PropertyUnknown.Resolution: Remove the unknown property from the request body and resubmit the request if the operation failed.

PropertyValueFormatError.Description: Indicates that a property was given the correct value type but the value of that property was not supported.  This includes value size/length exceeded.
PropertyValueFormatError.Message: The value OValue for the property oData is of a different format than the property can accept.
PropertyValueFormatError.Resolution: Correct the value for the property in the request body and resubmit the request if the operation failed.

ResourceDoesNotExists.Description: Indicates that a resource change or creation was attempted but that the operation cannot proceed because the resource does not exists.
ResourceDoesNotExists.Message: The requested resource does not exists.

ResourceAlreadyExists.Description: Indicates that a resource change or creation was attempted but that the operation cannot proceed because the resource already exists.
ResourceAlreadyExists.Resolution: Do not repeat the create operation as the resource has already been created.

PropertyValueNotInList.Description: Indicates that a property was given the correct value type but the value of that property was not supported.  This values not in an enumeration
PropertyValueNotInList.Message: The value OValue for the property oData is not in the list of acceptable values.
PropertyValueNotInList.Resolution: Choose a value from the enumeration list that the implementation can support and resubmit the request if the operation failed.

PropertyMissing.Description: Indicates that a required property was not supplied as part of the request.
PropertyMissing.Message: The property oData is a required property and must be included in the request.
PropertyMissing.Resolution: Ensure that the property is in the request body or headers and has a valid value and resubmit the request if the operation failed.

AccountForSessionNoLongerExists.Description: Indicates that the account for the session has been removed, thus the session has been removed as well.
AccountForSessionNoLongerExists.Message: The account for the current session has been removed, thus the current session has been removed as well.
AccountForSessionNoLongerExists.Resolution: Attempt to connect with a valid account.

SessionTimeLimitExceeded.Description: Indicates that the session has timed out.
SessionTimeLimitExceeded.Message: The session establishment failed due to the session has timed out.
SessionTimeLimitExceeded.Resolution: Try to create a new session(if supported).

UserNopermission.Description: Indicates that the user does not have permission to operate on this resource.
UserNopermission.Message: The resource deletion failed due to the user does not have permission to operate on this resource.
UserNopermission.Resolution: Try to apply for your permission.

UserNamePasswordError.Description: Indicates that the user name or password is entered incorrectly
UserNamePasswordError.Message: Resource creation failed due to user password input error.
UserNamePasswordError.Resolution: Attempt to connect with a valid account.

UserHasBeenLocked.Description: Indicates that the user has been locked
UserHasBeenLocked.Message: Resource creation failed due to user has been locked.
UserHasBeenLocked.Resolution: Attempt to connect with a valid account.

Duplicatepassworderror.Description: The duplicate password is the same as the new password
Duplicatepassworderror.Message: The duplicate password is the same as the new password.
Duplicatepassworderror.Resolution: Attempt to connect with a valid account.

SameHistoryPassword.Resolution: Attempt to connect with a valid account.

SameHistoryUserName.Resolution: Attempt to connect with a valid account.

DictionaryVerificationFailed.Resolution: Attempt to connect with a valid account.

PasswordValidDaysError.Message: The remaining validity period of the password is already 0. Please change the password in time.

ModifyOsUserFailed.Description: Modify os user failed, please closed ssh connection and try again.
ModifyOsUserFailed.Message: Modify os user failed, please closed ssh connection and try again.
ModifyOsUserFailed.Resolution: Closed ssh connection and try again.

ModifyOsPwdFailed.Description: Modify os password failed, please try again later.
ModifyOsPwdFailed.Message: Modify os password failed, please try again later.

SecurityLoadCheckFailed.Description: Security load configure is not met.
SecurityLoadCheckFailed.Message: Security load configure is not met.
SecurityLoadCheckFailed.Resolution: Change you login time or ip.

AuthenticationFailed.Resolution: Attempt to connect with a valid account.
